subject: Hockey, Ice
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Zemgus Girgensons, a center for the Buffalo Sabres, earned a spot in the N.H.L. All-Star Game because of the support he received in the league’s fan voting competition, provided largely by Latvia, his home country.
